hdr-135106.def: Ratio of the average income of the richest 20 percent of the population to the average income of the poorest 20 percent of the population.
hdr-135106.name: Income inequality, quintile ratio
hdr-135106.source: HDRO calculations based on data from World Bank (2019a). World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed on 15 July 2019.
hdr-135106.dataset: HDRO calculations based on data from World Bank (2019a). World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed on 15 July 2019.
